Texts.Chs: ...我的朋友，这就是为什么我们不能像对待小狗一样对待丁达洛斯的猎犬。不管怎样，我这是闲扯。要制作属于你的兜帽，你需要将五个诺克石锭、一个未知能量核心和一个偏方三八面体放入祭坛，然后颂唱Horvalaatsh的咒文。
Texts.Eng: ...and that, my friend, is why the Hounds of Tindalos are not to be treated like a puppy. Anyhow, I rambled off again. Get yourself your 5 Nocxium Bars, and Unknown Reactor and a Trapezohedron and you'll have the finest lower-robe a cultist could hope for!

Texts.Chs: 关于信徒服饰的获取指南
Texts.Eng: A guide to proper cultist formal attire

Texts.Chs: 信徒真正的服饰 - 下装
